Zone.BossTaunt4: You won't lay a&cr;ball on me!
Zone.BossTaunt8: You're not good enough for this mode!

Zone.BossTaunt3: My Witch magic is hula strong now!
Zone.BossTaunt4: My tikis have been training hard!
Zone.BossTaunt6: Float like an ooga, sting like a booga!

Zone.BossTaunt3: For a while I forgot who I was.
Zone.BossTaunt4: Your beating induced amnesia in me.
Zone.BossTaunt5: I wandered nameless for a time.
Zone.BossTaunt6: I checked my&cr;mail and remembered:&cr;Baron Digo
Zone.BossTaunt7: Now I've got more confidence than ever!
Zone.BossTaunt8: No arrow will pierce my hide!

Zone.BossTaunt1: Well, well, well. . .&cr;If it isn't the Frog.
Zone.BossTaunt2: I know you, Frog.&cr;All too well!
Zone.BossTaunt3: So, you up for another shot?
Zone.BossTaunt4: Can you beat my&cr;flies a second time?
Zone.BossTaunt7: I've got lots more insects this time!
Zone.BossTaunt8: Are you ready for moths and ants?
Zone.BossTaunt9: My insects are the knees of bees!

Zone.BossTaunt1: I know you, Frog.&cr;You defeated me.
Zone.BossTaunt2: I was angry before. Now I'm cold.
Zone.BossTaunt3: My steely disposition is my new shield.
Zone.BossTaunt5: I am calm like a lake.
Zone.BossTaunt7: I see now that my rage defeated me.
Zone.BossTaunt8: My new serenity&cr;will be your end.

Zone.BossTaunt6: Frog, I name thee 'Hero of Modes!'
Zone.BossTaunt8: I've got a whole new&cr;mystery for you!
Zone.BossTaunt9: Go for the gold! You're almost there!

ScoreTip.text: Use the right mouse button to&cr;cancel the Laser powerup.
When changing lily pads try&cr;using the right mouse button.
Use the right mouse button to&cr;swap between ball colors.
You can jump to an empty lilypad&cr;by clicking on it.
Use the Laser powerup to trigger&cr;other powerups!
Shoot fruit for extra points&cr;and a Zuma bar boost.
Shooting through gaps increases&cr;the points you get for a match!
The Lightning powerup&cr;destroys all balls of&cr;your target's color.
Beating a level without&cr;losing a life will earn a&cr;Perfect Level Bonus.
Beating Ace Time on a level will&cr;give you a bonus.
The Laser powerup slows time so&cr;you can make precise shots.
The Laser powerup can be used to&cr;collect fruit!
Fill the Zuma bar to stop new&cr;balls from coming.
The Accuracy powerup makes your&cr;shots faster for a short period.
You receive a Chain Bonus for&cr;each consecutive match after&cr;five in a row.
Get multiple matches in a single&cr;shot for a Combo Bonus.

Level.NextLevelText: Oh no! Jungle Boss is on a rampage! Blast him through holes in the curve when his shield is down. But don't let the curve reach the skull!

Hint.text: Your puny spheres cannot stop me!
Give up this time, frog!
No way you beat me twice!
I lull you into false confidence!
My teeth are feeling gnashy!

DeathText.line: My tongue's doing no better than the first time!

Level.NextLevelText: You've awakened Village Boss from his slumber! Use the lilypads to take shots at his heads when they glow. Be sure to keep the balls out of the skull!

Boss.wordbubble: Foolish Amphibian!&cr;Just try to breech&cr;my tiki defenses!

Hint.text: My magic is stronger now!
I've been taking magic night classes!
Sorcerous power is ready to defeat you!
Stop hitting me, frog!

DeathText.line: My witchy magic failed me with big aplomb!
I can't even blame my slave tikis this time.

Hint.text: Ha! The Baron deals defeat!
The Baron fears no hero frog
In case you forgot, I'm Baron Digo!
Digo's the name, pain's the game!
Make way for magnificent me!

DeathText.line: What's this? Again you defeat me?
I don't deserve to call myself Baron Digo.
What's that, Pookie? You still believe in me? Yay!

Boss.wordbubble: Too bad you're just a frog,&cr;without any method of&cr;cracking my shell!

Hint.text: Insects are the dominant lifeform!
We owe everything to bees and ants!
I'm fully pestilent!
Six legs good, four legs bad!
Amphibians are our enemies!

DeathText.line: I talked a big game and left the same holes in my defense.
Am I ever going to learn, even a little bit?

Boss.wordbubble: I'm gonna stain&cr;you like a nice&cr;pair of slacks!

Hint.text: My rage is like ice.
Nothing can make me lose my cool.
Your insult only hardens my resolve.
LOSING IT! RRAARRRRG!!!
I am master of my temper.

DeathText.line: Oh, foof! Why does this keep happening?
My guru said I needed to chill but it didn't help.
I guess this is pretty much your island now.

Hint.text: Keep it up, Frog!
You're doing great!
Match those crazy orbs!
Almost time for my devil form!
I love watching a master at work!

Boss.wordbubble: Welcome to Hell, Frog.&cr;I am your end.

Hint.text: I'm constantly amazed!
How do you do it?
You should write a strategy guide!
Your Zuma moves inspire me!
This Devil costume's pretty scary, huh?

Boss.wordbubble: Let's see how you fare&cr;against your shadow!

DeathText.line: Wow. Just wow. I've played a lot of Zuma.
But you stomped all over me in every way.
Try the Iron Frog mode or the Challenges!
